documentation.text:
@dev This contract inherit from abstract contract "Register". It register the whitelist of accounts allowed to take art in democratic activities of the DAO. This list of citizens is edited by two authorities:
  - Citizens_Registering_Authorities: List of address allowed to add citizens. We can have severals address but usually one single Delegation contract address is enough.
  - Citizens_Banning_Authorities: List of address allowed to remove citizens.  We can have severals address but usually one single Delegation contract address is enough.
 
 The contract should be given authority to mint token on DemoCoin token
@dev function selector of {Contains} function. It's the selector other contracts have to use if they want to check if an address is citizen of the DAO
@dev Mapping of all citizens of the DAO
@dev list of all citizens of the DAO
@dev List of accounts that have been Permanently banned and can not be added anymore (blacklist)
@dev Amount of token to transfer to a new registered citizen.

typeDescriptions.typeString: function (struct EnumerableSet.AddressSet storage pointer,address) view returns (bool)

documentation.text:
@dev Add a new citizen to the whitelist of account allowed to take part in democratic activities of the DAO. Only accounts contained in {Citizens_Registering_Authorities} can call this function.
 @param new_citizen Account to be registered as citizen.

typeDescriptions.typeString: function (struct EnumerableSet.AddressSet storage pointer,address) view returns (bool)

documentation.text:
@dev Ban a citizen forever. The citizen is blacklisted.
 @param citizen Citizen account to be blacklisted

documentation.text:
@dev Grant pardon to a banned citizen. If the citizen has been banned for an unlimited amount of time, this function is the only way to let him come back. This function is only callable by Banning Authorities.
 @param citizen Citizen account to be granted pardon
@dev Function callable by a banned citizen to end his bannishment when the sentence is finished (if his sentence is limited in time)

@dev Setter for {New_Citizen_Mint_Amount} state variable
 @param amount New value of New_Citizen_Mint_Amount

  - Citizens_Registering_Authorities: List of address allowed to add citizens. We can have severals address but usually one single Delegation contract address is enough.
  - Citizens_Banning_Authorities: List of address allowed to remove citizens.  We can have severals address but usually one single Delegation contract address is enough.
 
 The contract should be given authority to mint token on DemoCoin token

devdoc.details: This contract inherit from abstract contract "Register". It register the whitelist of accounts allowed to take art in democratic activities of the DAO. This list of citizens is edited by two authorities:  - Citizens_Registering_Authorities: List of address allowed to add citizens. We can have severals address but usually one single Delegation contract address is enough.  - Citizens_Banning_Authorities: List of address allowed to remove citizens.  We can have severals address but usually one single Delegation contract address is enough.  The contract should be given authority to mint token on DemoCoin token

Ban_Citizen(address,uint256).details: Ban a citizen for a limited or unlimited amount of time. Only callable by Banning Auhorities

params.duration: Duration of the bannishment. If it's null, the citizen is banned for an unlimited amount of time.

Citizen_Finish_Ban().details: Function callable by a banned citizen to end his bannishment when the sentence is finished (if his sentence is limited in time)

Contains(address).details: Check whether an account is citizen of the current Web3 Direct Democracy project.

Get_Banning_Authorities().details: Get the list of banning authorities

Get_Citizen_Number().details: Get the number of citizens in the DAO

Get_Permanently_Banned_Citizens().details: Get the list of blacklisted citizens (permanently banned citizens)

Get_Registering_Authorities().details: Get the list of Registering authorities

Grace_Citizen(address).details: Grant pardon to a banned citizen. If the citizen has been banned for an unlimited amount of time, this function is the only way to let him come back. This function is only callable by Banning Authorities.

params.citizen: Citizen account to be granted pardon

Permanently_Ban_Citizen(address).details: Ban a citizen forever. The citizen is blacklisted.

Register_Citizen(address).details: Add a new citizen to the whitelist of account allowed to take part in democratic activities of the DAO. Only accounts contained in {Citizens_Registering_Authorities} can call this function.

params.new_citizen: Account to be registered as citizen.

params.removed_authority: Address to remove from Authorities lists.

Set_Citizen_Data(address,bytes).details: Modify the Data field of a Citizen. Only callable by Registering authorities

Set_Constitution(address).details: The function Allows to change the Constitution contract the current Institution obey to. The function is only callable by the {Constitution_Address}

params.new_constitution: Address of the new Constitution contract.

params.Name: name of the Institution
params.new_citizen_mint_amount: Amount of token to mint for new registered accounts
params.token_address: Address of DemoCoin token that will be used to transfert initial token amount to new registered citizens

Citizens.details: Mapping of all citizens of the DAO

Citizens_List.details: list of all citizens of the DAO

Contains_Function_Selector.details: function selector of {Contains} function. It's the selector other contracts have to use if they want to check if an address is citizen of the DAO

New_Citizen_Mint_Amount.details: Amount of token to transfer to a new registered citizen.

Permanently_Banned_Citizens.details: List of accounts that have been Permanently banned and can not be added anymore (blacklist)

Constitution_Address().notice: Address of the constitution of the DAO
